upgrade.race.creep.description.1: When you have no absorption effect, you gain Absorption V at the cost of one gunpowder
upgrade.race.creep.description.11: • Power VI explosion is created when you lose all of your absorption hearts
upgrade.race.creep.description.12: Instead of gaining Absorption V, you gain Absorption X
upgrade.race.creep.description.2: Explosion on death is twice as strong
upgrade.race.creep.description.3: Mundane arrows you fire create a Power III explosion on contact with entities or blocks
upgrade.race.creep.description.31: Mundane arrows you fire create a Power VI explosion on contact with entities or blocks
upgrade.race.creep.description.311: Mundane arrows you fire create a Power XII explosion on contact with entities or blocks
upgrade.race.creep.description.3111: Mundane arrows you fire create a Power XXIV explosion on contact with entities or blocks
upgrade.race.bloodborne.description.1: Immune to knockback from direct damage
upgrade.race.bloodborne.description.11:
You do more damage the lower health you have.
• Up to +100% total damage in increments of 5%
upgrade.race.bloodborne.description.2:
When a player dies within 16 blocks of you:
• Mobs within 32 blocks gain:
  • Weakness V 0:05
  • Slownesss V 0:05
• Players within 16 blocks gain:
  • Strength II 0:10
  • Haste II 0:10
  • Speed II 0:10
